Package index

All functions

adopt_calibration()
Adopt a calibrated design configuration
apply_recommended_to_args()
Apply a recommended early-stopping configuration to the argument list
calculate_median_survival_matrix_cpp()
Calculate median survival for multiple hazard samples (C++ implementation)
calculate_median_survival_piecewise_cpp()
Calculate median survival for piecewise exponential model (C++ implementation)
calibrate_alpha()
Calibrate interim and final thresholds for single-arm designs
compare_simon_to_bo()
Validate BO calibration against Simon enumeration
create_simulation_cluster()
Create a reusable evolveTrial simulation cluster
draw_posterior_hazard_samples_cpp()
Draw posterior hazard samples (C++ implementation)
draw_posterior_response_rate()
Draw posterior samples for binary response rate
estimate_vsref_gate_timing()
Estimate when the vs-reference interim gates can be satisfied
evaluate_ph_grid()
Evaluate PH-based grid of designs
exp_arms_from_args()
Extract experimental arm names from an argument list
explore_early_stopping_from_cal()
Explore early stopping knobs around a calibrated design
export_scenario_table_to_excel()
Export a scenario summary table to Excel
export_scenario_table_to_png()
Render the scenario summary table to a PNG image
filter_early_grid()
Filter early-stopping designs by operating targets
find_simon_design()
Find optimal Simon design
grid_calibrate()
Calibrate historical-control thresholds over a grid
ph_beta_mode_var()
Compute mode and variance of log-HR posterior for PH model (DISPATCHER)
ph_beta_mode_var_cpp()
Compute mode and variance of log-HR posterior for PH model (C++ implementation)
plot_calibration()
Plot power versus type I error for calibration grids
plot_early_tradeoff()
Plot early-stopping trade-offs
pretty_scenario_matrix()
Summarise simulation output by scenario and arm
prob_response_below()
Calculate posterior probability that response rate is below threshold
prob_response_exceeds()
Calculate posterior probability that response rate exceeds threshold
recommend_design_from_early()
Recommend a single early-stopping design
release_cluster()
Release an evolveTrial simulation cluster
run_scenarios()
Evaluate a design across multiple scenarios
run_simulation_binary()
Run binary endpoint trial simulation
run_simulation_pure()
Run a full set of evolveTrial simulations for a design specification

Sample medians for vs-ref independent model (DISPATCHER)
sample_vs_ref_medians_independent_cpp()
Sample medians for vs-ref independent model (C++ implementation)

sample_vs_ref_medians_ph_cpp()
Sample medians for vs-ref PH model (C++ implementation)
scenarios_from_grid()
Build scenario overrides from a grid of design choices
set_futility_medians()
Adjust futility medians for experimental arms
